channel.title: Report on How to Kill a Mockingbird
channel.description:
I need to write a 3 page essay on how Jem and Scout learn respect from Boo Radley, Mrs. Dubose, Atticus, Mr. Raymond, Cal, Aunt Alexandra, and Tom Robinson. Needs to have an introductory paragraph, a paragraph for each of the above characters and how Jem and Scout learned respect from them, and a conclusion paragraph.
There is also a big portion on hand drawing scenes from the book but I think my teacher would notice that they were printed off a computer so I'll cover that part.
I skimmed the book over the summer and now I need to write the report but school starts in two days so I'm in a little bit of a pickle.
Any comments whatsoever would help, just little notes on how you personally think Jem and Scout learned respect from those individuals.

item.title: Report on How to Kill a Mockingbird
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Hey I wrote like 30 essays on that book. Know something really funny? I burnt all my homework papers at the beginning of summer over my friend’s house. How interesting yet sad for you. lol, sorry man. I was just about to go and look for it when I stopped in my hallway and realized it wasn’t there. Why not just try www.sparknotes.com

~Ron

Read full topic
item.source: Report on How to Kill a Mockingbird

item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

To Dumbass #1: It was due the 14th. A little late, but thanks for the consideration.

To Dumbass #2: Don’t post in a homework help thread to say that you won’t help. You stupid fuck.

item.title: Report on How to Kill a Mockingbird
item.dc:creator: @Aukake Aukake
item.description:
@Aukake wrote:

Yea hey thanks. I did a google search for a study guide and it came up with plenty of information to write a report with. Due TOMORROW! Ahh I’m gonna have to stay up late tonight though. Oh well, kind of like school initiation. A nice slap in the face reminder that I’ll soon be getting 5 hours of sleep and my pee will turn dark and maybe red due to the large amount of caffeinated drinks I am soon to consume that will devour me from the inside out.

Read full topic
